titles.title: Peridotite composition, Appendix D data for "A reference Earth model for the heat producing elements and associated geoneutrino flux"

resource.publisher: EarthChem Library(ECL) | Interdisciplinary Earth Data Alliance (IEDA) | Columbia University; doi:10.17616/R3V644

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This dataset is a compilation of chemical composition of global distributed spinel and garnet xenolithic peridotite and massif peridotite. The goal of this compilation is to estimate the average composition of sub-continental lithospheric mantle by xenolithic peridotites. Massif peridotite may provide information for the lithospheric mantle under oceanic crust.

Related publications: Ackerman, L., E. Jelinek, G. Medaris, J. Jezek, W. Siebel, and L.
